vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.3.20;
married to Adam (H0121);
mother of: Cain (H7014B), Abel (H1893) and Seth (H8352)
Also named: Eua<\i> (Εὖα "Eve" G2096)
§ Eve = "life" or "living"
the first woman, wife of Adam
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
夏娃 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "生命" 或 "活著的"
世上第一個女人, 亞當的妻子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
夏娃 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "生命" 或 "活着的"
世上第一个女人, 亚当的妻子
